news.title: Berkshire Hathaway shares dip nearly 3% after shocking Buffett exit and an earnings decline
news.summary: Investors are processing Warren Buffett's surprise announcement to step down and envision a new path for the conglomerate after his legendary 60-year run.

news.title: Hollywood studio stocks fall after Trump proposes foreign film tariff
news.summary: Shares of Netflix, Disney, WBD, Paramount and Comcast fell in premarket hours. President Donald Trump proposed a tariff on films shot outside the U.S.

news.title: Skechers to be acquired by 3G Capital in take-private deal, shares soar 25%
news.summary: No description available. No description available for this model. For more information on this model, please visit: www.cruiseworld.com/cruisemodel.

news.title: CNBC's Official Global Soccer Team Valuations 2025: Here's how the top 25 clubs in the world stack up
news.summary: The 25 most valuable teams in the world are worth an average of $2.76 billion, according to CNBC's Official Global Soccer Valuations 2025.

news.title: Bill Ackman's Pershing Square strikes $900 million deal for more control of Howard Hughes
news.summary: Ackman has said he wants to turn the real estate company into a "modern-day Berkshire Hathaway" Ackman: "I want to turn [Real estate] into a modern-day Buffett"

news.title: International stocks have been crushing U.S. equities. Morgan Stanley expects a reversal.
news.summary: Mike Wilson, chief market strategist at Morgan Stanley, says he likes U.S. over international equities from here. Wilson: "I think we're in for a very good year in the United States"

news.title: The one-in-a-trillion event tying Taiwan’s dollar, Trump trade policy and the AI revolution all together
news.summary: Bloomberg reports $767 billion of foreign assets held by Taiwan's life insurers. Taiwan’s currency is exploding higher, and along with it fears about what Bloomberg reports is $767billion of foreign Assets.

news.title: Billionaire Bill Ackman’s ‘modern Berkshire Hathaway’ has a long way to go to rival Warren Buffett
news.summary: Howard Hughes Holdings has a market capitalization of $3.4 billion, compared with  Berkshire Hathaway’s market cap of about $1.2 trillion.

news.title: Why a potential Shell blockbuster deal for BP makes sense
news.summary: Media reports said Shell may be looking to purchase rival BP. Observers say that could be the answer to lots of BP problems. Shell has not commented on the reports.

news.title: Here’s what I’ve learned after writing about Apple, Intel and Silicon Valley for over 30 years
news.summary: History repeats itself in Silicon Valley. A few wacky stories are worth remembering and AI is getting creepier every day. A look at some of the wacky things that have happened in the tech industry.
